title: Indian Army Recruitment 2017, Indian Army Jobs 2017 (530 Vacancies)
text:
Last Updated Wednesday, January 25, 2017 Advertisement 
Indian Army, Government of India is the largest land-based branch of the Indian Armed Forces. Various Career Opportunities available in Indian Army. Indian National Male / Female Candidates (Unmarried / Married) called for recruitment of various scheme of Course under Two type of Commission (Permanent Commission and Short Service Commission). Indian Army Job Offer Official Website is joinindianarmy.nic.in 
Permanent Commission -> A career in the Army till you retire. For a Permanent commission you have to join the National Defence Academy Khadakwasla or the Indian Military Academy Dehradun. 
Short Service Commission -> Candidates have the option of joining the Army and serving as a Commissioned Officer for 10 years and is extendable up to 14 years. At the end of this period you have two options. Either elect for a Permanent Commission or opt out. 
Entry Schemes: 
For Men -> Intermediate (10+2) [NDA, 10+2 TES], Graduate UPSC [IMA (DE), OTA SSC (Non-Tech], Graduate Non UPSC, Law Graduate, Engineer [UES, TGC, SS (Tech)], Post Graduate 
For Women -> Graduate UPSC, Graduate Non UPSC, Engineer Entry, Law Graduate, Post Graduate
